Html:
I want to add a StyleSheet into my MVCMusicStore (Like in page 30)
I follow exactly the procedures as the tutorial documentation. What I got was only the word of "ASP.NET MVC MUSIC STORE" like this:



I m using VS2010

Am I doing anything wrong or the documentation is wrong? Thanks.

Hi Moez_rebai,

You should try to add link below to your <head> in _Layout file:
<link href="@Url.Content("~/Content/Site.css")" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"/>

Good luck!
